H0.text: Vector is a quantity of motion that has both size as well as direction.

H1.text: Wave is a quantity of motion that has both size as well as direction.

H2.text: Vibration is a quantity of motion that has both size as well as direction.

H3.text: Speed is a quantity of motion that has both size as well as direction.

A4.text: Historically, vectors were introduced in geometry and physics (typically in mechanics) for quantities that have both a magnitude and a direction, such as displacements, forces and velocity.
